org.kaaproject.kaa.client.channel

Interface UserTransport

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KaaTransport
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultUserTransport

    public interface UserTransport
extends KaaTransport
    KaaTransport for the Endpoint service. Updates the Endpoint manager state.
    Author:
    Yaroslav Zeygerman
